en.name: Solitary Healing
en.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by {{20//25//30//35//40%}}. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases DoT dealt by the wearer by {{24//30//36//42//48%}}, lasting for 2 turn(s). When a target enemy suffering from DoT imposed by the wearer is defeated, regenerates {{4//4.5//5//5.5//6}} Energy for the wearer.

zh.name: 孤独的疗愈
zh.description: 使装备者的击破特攻提高{{20//25//30//35//40%}}。当装备者施放终结技时，使装备者造成的持续伤害提高{{24//30//36//42//48%}}，持续2回合。陷入装备者施加的持续伤害效果的敌方目标被消灭时，装备者恢复{{4//4.5//5//5.5//6}}点能量。
